definition: the sun and moon/day and month/every day and every month/season/life and livelihood
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
Sun Moon Lake in Nantou County, Taiwan
the sun and moon like a shuttle (idiom); How time flies!
the sun and moon shine once more/fig. things get back to normal after an upheaval
sun, moon and the five visible planets
halo/ring of light around the sun or moon

sentences.english: Swiftly fly the years, one season following another . Laden with happiness and tear .
sentences.chinese: 日月如梭，季节变换，满载着欢乐和泪水。

sentences.english: It can be said that Guqin players are always facing the universe.
sentences.chinese: 弹奏古琴，即是面对天地日月。

sentences.english: Easy word itself, is composed of two characters and combined into the sun.
sentences.chinese: 易字本身，是由日月二字组合而成。

sentences.english: The Shao people were moved from their beloved Lalu to the upper Sun Moon Village.
sentences.chinese: 在少人从他们心爱的拉鲁到上日月潭村。

sentences.english: Eclipses test the strength of our resolve and of our relationships.
sentences.chinese: 日月食会检验我们的决心和关系的牢固程度。

sentences.english: Sun follows day. night, stars, and moon;
sentences.chinese: 日月如梭，星月满天之后必然是黎明。

sentences.english: The most popular destinations are Taipei and the Sun and Moon Lake.
sentences.chinese: 最受欢迎的景点是台北和日月潭。

sentences.english: Time continues, times flies, and this world remains.
sentences.chinese: 时光流逝，光阴荏苒，日月如梭，世界依旧。

sentences.english: So the national sun 2 who god is?
sentences.chinese: 那么中华民族的日月二神是谁呢？

sentences.english: The worship of the sun and the moon can be demonstrated from the sunbird and frog-shaped ornaments.
sentences.chinese: 太阳神鸟与蛙形器体现了古蜀人日月崇拜的观念。

sentences.english: Hours and days and weeks I ' ll never have back.
sentences.chinese: 那些分分秒秒日日月月我永远都要不回来了。

sentences.english: Samsara moon, sickle, hammer about the struggle of the voyage.
sentences.chinese: 日月轮回，镰刀，铁锤讲述着斗争的航程。

sentences.english: Before that time, navigators determined directions by looking at the positions of the sun, the moon and the stars.
sentences.chinese: 北宋前，航海者是利用日月星辰的位置来判定方向。

sentences.english: Small bridge flowing water, sun and moon lake, shining everywhere thriving source of vitality.
sentences.chinese: 小桥流水，日月湖，到处焕发着勃勃生机。

sentences.english: "Sun Moon mountains rivers" is the symbol of natural objects symbolic universe.
sentences.chinese: “日月山川”，就是宇宙自然物的符化符号。

sentences.english: Time passes quickly, and now we are at the first anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 光阴似箭，日月如梭，今天是他逝世后的第一个周年。

definition: yin and yang/heaven and earth/the universe
lit. the Big Dipper 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1] has turned and the stars have moved/time flies/also written 斗轉星移|斗转星移[Dou3 zhuan3 xing1 yi2]
constellation (arch., now 星座)/one of the 28 constellations of traditional Chinese astronomy and astrology/motion of stars since one's birth (predetermining one's fate in astrology)
the seven planets of premodern astronomy (the Sun, the Moon, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, and Saturn)
bright moon/refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark/CL:輪|轮[lun2]
